response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest expectations. Given its unparalleled quality and significance, we believe it's worth every penny of $1,200,000. We understand the importance of making a deal that benefits both parties, so we are confident this price reflects the true worth of the product while ensuring a fair transaction for us. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
